reviews.review_text: the formula for the tablets has changed since last year and they don't dissolve as well as they used to but it still helps to keep toilet bowls cleaner than they would without them

This does NOT make your water blue. However, it does make bubbles every time you flush, much like urine bubbles that don't go down. it does help to keep the toilet clean. (Less scrubbing). Each tablet lasts about 2 weeks (for me). It depends on how many people in your household. The instructions says don't handle tablet with bare hands, yet the packaging is difficult to open. Either wear gloves when tearing open the pouch or use scissors to cut open the pouch first. Tearing it open is not that easy.

reviews.title: Where's the Bleach?
reviews.review_text: The price was great, about half the cost of my usual Clorox. When I opened the wrapper, there was no hint of bleach smell; within a week the bowl was dirty again and the tablet had become a tiny puddle of gel. We've never had issues with Great Value products, but this one didn't work for us.

reviews.title: horrible product
reviews.review_text: horrible product, it only smells to bleach for like 3 flushes , it stop smelling or doing anything . I got curious of why it stopped working just to see a giant swollen sticky thing in the bottom of the tank, I pull it out , (wich was very gross) and I noticed it didn't smell to anything just like plastic, I just throw it in the trash and the new ones too. I guess I should had pay a little more and buy the authentic bleach tablets from the original brand

reviews.title: Goop and mold
reviews.review_text: These are terrible!! I've purchased numerous Grear Value brands before and they're normally comparable to name brand, but these are GARBAGE! I deep cleaned all our toilets (we have 3) and added one of these “tablets” After a couple hours and flushing, the water would be foamy. Over a week, the “tablet” in the tank turned into a pile of goop. Mold began to accumulate inside the bowl! I just cleaned the toilets literally only a week ago! I had been an avid user of the Clorox Bleach tablets and will definitely be going back. The only time I would get mold in the toilet is when the tablet ran out. Save your money.

reviews.title: BE WARNED!
reviews.review_text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS! It turns into a gelatinous goo in your tank. It caused so many issues it was unbelievable. My husband was able to fix the problems (in all three toilets!) but what about people who aren't handy? Plumbers must love products like this! Walmart was out of the Clorox brand so I bought these. I won't use products like this ever again after doing a quick web search and seeing how bad all of them are for toilets.

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.review_text: Horrible, horrible product. Becomes a blob in the toilet tank that I had to fish out of 2 tanks. Mold started to form in my tank 2 days after dropping these in. There isn't even the faintest smell of bleach. Zero cleaning power. Total waste of money. Read the other negative reviews. Stick with the well known brand for bleach tablets.

reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK

reviews.title: Complete Mess!

reviews.title: Terrible product—don't waste your money

It disappeared quickly and did nothing to help clean the toilet. It's worthless and I will be purchasing a different brand from now on.

reviews.title: FAKE!

reviews.title: Garbage

reviews.title: Waste Of Money

Used to use them all the time, but now they just turn into a blob in your tank that sits there and does nothing. Cleaning action stopped after a few days at best. After a week I tried stirring up the blob only to find it stuck to the bottom of the tank. And the gel gets under the flapper and causes issues. I'm going to have to drain the tank and scrub the rest of it out. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Formula changed! These are HORRIBLE!
reviews.review_text: I have bought the great value brand toilet tabs for years on end, and they have been great functionally as well as being a better price point than the name brands. I purchased a new box several weeks ago and realized the box looks the same but the content packaging and size of the tablets has changed. They are most definitely NOT the same product I've always received. Skip to today when I realized the toilets in the house were already starting to have a film and form rings. This only ever used to happen when the tablet dissolved completely. Now it's happening before it's dissolved, AND it is creating cloudy water in the tank and bubbles as it flushes. I noticed that a couple weeks ago and was confused but at the time didn't connect the two. The formula HAS TO GO BACK TO THE OLD FORMULA. THESE ARE ABSOLUTE TRASH! I will be looking elsewhere for these now. Absolutely the worst product change I have ever witnessed with my own eyes! They do not work anymore!

The toilet bowl is dirty when the milky puddle is still in the water tank. What a waste of money. Great Value's bleach tablets used to be good. Then they went away for a while, at least from our store, and when they returned the product seems to have changed.

They crumble from the pack and dissolve almost instantly. No bleach smell whatsoever. At first, I thought I just got a bad batch because I ordered online and received them via shipping. That was about a month ago. So, I decided to go in-store to pick up a box. It's the same crumby crud! I guess they changed manufacturers or something. Walmart, if you did, please go back to your original maker of these because they are absolutely trash now.

reviews.title: Save your money
reviews.review_text: I was trying to save money, so I decided to try the great value brand of toilet bowl, bleach tablets. They say they have a gel action in the tank, they look like a jellyfish in the tank. Unfortunately, the bowl water looks unclean ither than there are a few bubbles on the surface of the water after you flush. reviews.title: Formulation has changed, no longer effective
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for years and years. More than a decade. As many others have written, Walmart recently changed this product, but the packaging is the same. Used to be a pressed cake of a powder type product. Lasted 2-3 months and did a great job. It would slowly dissolve and shrink to a smaller and smaller puck. In the past few months, it is now a different chemical makeup, slightly different shape and is more a crystalline puck which turns into a blobby mound. And does not last nearly as long, which means your bowl starts to get dirty much faster. I can't imagine why anyone would continue to use this product, having experienced the effectiveness of the prior. With all these one star ratings, you'd think Walmart would want to fix this mistake but who knows. We're changing to Clorox, which I believe is a slightly smaller puck, at a higher price unfortunately...but at least it works! Also, don't know if it's a coincidence but some of the rubber and plastic parts in the the flapper/valve assembly have disintegrated substantially. Even the tube which provides the water fill has become gummy, semi-melted, and it doesn't even sit in the water! I have a feeling there's some nasty chemical(s) in this new formulation which are particularly corrosive to rubber and or vinyl plastics. So not only less effective but potentially destroying the parts inside the tank, including the gaskets! Get ready for a leak!

It is also instructed to only use the tablets in toilets used daily. I will say these toilet bowl cleaner tablets are bigger than other tablets I've used. There is no strong scent of bleach, which I'm honestly thankful for because a strong bleach scent can give me a headache. So far, I feel these are working in keeping my toilet bowl clean between deep cleanings. I do see a lot of bubbles in the toilet water after each flush, as I would with other toilet bowl cleaner tablets. As for the tablet itself, it seems to be dissolving at a good rate, which I hope means it will last at least a month or two. So far, I feel the Great Value Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablets work well at keeping my toilet bowl cleaned longer between deep cleanings. For that reason, I do recommend the Great Value Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablets with bleaching action.

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
reviews.review_text: I've been using this and similar products for many years and am aware of how they normally work. I have to agree with other folks that this product has been reformulated or changed and is no longer effective. Normally, when you drop a fresh tablet into a tank, you get an initial stiff dose of chlorine smell from it, before it settles down to a steady, low dose. Not this time. And it has had no effect in keeping bacterial growth in check. A 'normal' tablet remains solid and gradually shrinks in size as the material slowly dissolves. This batch quickly dissolves into a semi-crystalline blob of mush. I found this out when I lifted the tank lid to see why the fill was running on. The flapper had warped and wouldn't seal. Admittedly, the flapper was very old, an easy fix and everyone says this can happen with cleaner tablets, but the timing struck me as odd. Bottom line: 'Bleaching Action' is not the same as actual chlorine bleach in these products. This formulation relies on borax and I will avoid such in the future, as it absolutely doesn't work for me.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great Value Automatic Toilet Cleaner Tablets with Bleach are a practical and effective solution for maintaining a fresh and clean toilet bowl with minimal effort. These tablets do an excellent job of keeping the toilet bowl clean between deep cleanings. The bleach helps to eliminate stains and disinfect the bowl, ensuring a hygienic environment. Simply drop a tablet into the tank, and it starts working automatically with every flush. This convenience means you don't have to remember to clean regularly, making it ideal for busy households. The tablets release a pleasant, fresh scent that helps to mask any unpleasant odors, leaving your bathroom smelling clean and inviting. Priced affordably, these tablets offer great value for the quality of cleaning they provide. A single tablet lasts for several weeks, making them a cost-effective choice for toilet maintenance. One downside is that the bleach can sometimes cause discoloration in the toilet tank if used excessively, so it's important to follow the instructions carefully. Overall, Great Value Automatic Toilet Cleaner Tablets with Bleach are a reliable and efficient way to keep your toilet clean and fresh with minimal effort. They're a smart addition to any cleaning routine, especially for those seeking convenience and effectiveness on a budget.

reviews.title: Great cleaner.

reviews.title: Easy to use and do work just don't lasy long with

reviews.title: Love these!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These work great! They leave my toilet bowl looking and smelling clean! They keep it from getting any water rings and I know that it's killing the germs as well! Awesome!

reviews.title: Easy cleaning at a great price
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We use these regularly. They are a great value for the product. The individual packaging is convenient. They help keep the bowl clean between brush cleaning and leave it smelling clean.

reviews.title: Bleach power
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This works well, but it does still have the standard bleach scent to it. It also comes in a relatively small package for being a value set. Works but there are equal options on the market.

reviews.title: Nope
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'd safely say this product doesn't really perform as I had hoped. We do have hard water but a water softener and this product left brownish rings in the toilet bowl. Kinda bummed…

reviews.title: Generous amount of product per tablet!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Each tablet is a generous size, a very good amount of product for the price. Scent is your typical bleach product, just not as strong, which I love the smell of bleach.

reviews.title: Liked it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We found this product to be effective. The scent was pleasant and fresh smelling. Get value for the amount of product you get. Packaging could be better.

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These tabs are so easy to use! They are quick and effective. They have a fresh, clean scent without smelling overly like bleach. I love how convenient it is. Just set it and forget it!

reviews.title: Work so well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These are so much more effective and efficient than I thought they would be. Easy to open and simple packaging. Highly recommended!! No strong smell just a little fresh clean scent.

reviews.title: Toilet Bowl Tablets
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Great Value Toilet Bowel Cleaner Tablets are easy to use. I don't know how effective they are at helping keep the toilet bowl clean but I like the added benefit of continuous bleaching.

reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These tablets have definitely helped keep our toilets cleaner. They are simple to use. I like that they also help the bathroom smell fresher with every flush.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Just started using and I haven't noticed a huge difference, but it's only been a few days. So far, I think it's fine. No scent, I was worried it might smell like bleach, but it doesn't.

reviews.title: New routine add
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Leaves our toilet smelling fresh and looking clean everyday. It's not a harsh material at all. For the price, it works amazing! I will be adding these to my monthly household essentials.

reviews.title: Work great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These work great. As soon as I flushed I could smell the bleach which in my opinion is perfect to disinfect a toilet. I like that there are 4 tabs in one box I find it more of a value that way.

reviews.title: Didn't seem to function correctly
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this product in two of my toilets and the product doesn't seem to be melting it's just stuck at the bottom of the tank like a paste substance definitely seems like a product I would purchase
the formula for the tablets has changed since last year and they don't dissolve as well as they used to but it still helps to keep toilet bowls cleaner than they would without them

This does NOT make your water blue. However, it does make bubbles every time you flush, much like urine bubbles that don't go down. it does help to keep the toilet clean. (Less scrubbing). Each tablet lasts about 2 weeks (for me). It depends on how many people in your household. The instructions says don't handle tablet with bare hands, yet the packaging is difficult to open. Either wear gloves when tearing open the pouch or use scissors to cut open the pouch first. Tearing it open is not that easy.

reviews.title: Where's the Bleach?
reviews.review_text: The price was great, about half the cost of my usual Clorox. When I opened the wrapper, there was no hint of bleach smell; within a week the bowl was dirty again and the tablet had become a tiny puddle of gel. We've never had issues with Great Value products, but this one didn't work for us.

reviews.title: horrible product
reviews.review_text: horrible product, it only smells to bleach for like 3 flushes , it stop smelling or doing anything . I got curious of why it stopped working just to see a giant swollen sticky thing in the bottom of the tank, I pull it out , (wich was very gross) and I noticed it didn't smell to anything just like plastic, I just throw it in the trash and the new ones too. I guess I should had pay a little more and buy the authentic bleach tablets from the original brand

reviews.title: Goop and mold
reviews.review_text: These are terrible!! I've purchased numerous Grear Value brands before and they're normally comparable to name brand, but these are GARBAGE! I deep cleaned all our toilets (we have 3) and added one of these “tablets” After a couple hours and flushing, the water would be foamy. Over a week, the “tablet” in the tank turned into a pile of goop. Mold began to accumulate inside the bowl! I just cleaned the toilets literally only a week ago! I had been an avid user of the Clorox Bleach tablets and will definitely be going back. The only time I would get mold in the toilet is when the tablet ran out. Save your money.

reviews.title: BE WARNED!
reviews.review_text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS! It turns into a gelatinous goo in your tank. It caused so many issues it was unbelievable. My husband was able to fix the problems (in all three toilets!) but what about people who aren't handy? Plumbers must love products like this! Walmart was out of the Clorox brand so I bought these. I won't use products like this ever again after doing a quick web search and seeing how bad all of them are for toilets.

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.review_text: Horrible, horrible product. Becomes a blob in the toilet tank that I had to fish out of 2 tanks. Mold started to form in my tank 2 days after dropping these in. There isn't even the faintest smell of bleach. Zero cleaning power. Total waste of money. Read the other negative reviews. Stick with the well known brand for bleach tablets.

reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
reviews.review_text: I got this brand instead of the Clorox brand to save some money. I did save money but these drop ins DO NOT work at all. They just made a gel where it settled in my toilet tank that I had to clean out before I could replace with the Clorox ones I usually buy.

reviews.title: Complete Mess!
reviews.review_text: Horrible product—formula has changed. This used to be a great product, I've used them for years. The product has changed in the worst possible way. It doesn't dissolve properly in the tank, it just festers and turn into a useless mess that you have to empty the tank and clean out the mess—will not buy again!

reviews.title: Terrible product—don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: This product is worthless. It used to be good, but they changed the formula and now it is terrible. It does not help my toilet stay clean. It doesn't dissolve like the old tablets used to—the best way I can describe how it looked after a couple of days was like it was melting. It disappeared quickly and did nothing to help clean the toilet. It's worthless and I will be purchasing a different brand from now on.

reviews.title: Great item
reviews.review_text: This product is a must have and must use. It works very well and easy to use, cut open bag drop the tablet away from the plunger and it takes care of the smell, stains and bowl. It lasts 30 days based on usage from my experience.

reviews.title: Liked the old bleach tablets far better
reviews.review_text: These tablets have changed in size - too big and need to be broken for use. They are also no longer made of the same material and feel soapy/waxy. will not purchase again

reviews.title: FAKE!
reviews.review_text: THESE ARE FAKE! These are nothing more than compressed paper! No cleaning agent in them WHAT-SO-EVER! A TOTAL SCAM! Walmart should IMMEDIATELY discontinue this product. This kind of rip off will ruin Walmart's reputation!!

reviews.title: Didn't work as promised
reviews.review_text: The tablet completely dissolved within 2 days. I bought this product before and it stayed in tablet form until it was gone. This just let a huge blob of goo in my toilet tank.

reviews.title: Turns to goo and stops cleaning
reviews.review_text: I've bought this before and it worked, but the last batch the items just turned to goo and they don't disinfect the toilet anymore after the first few days. Then you're stuck with this big gooey blob in the bottom of your tank.

reviews.title: Tablets No Longer the Same
reviews.review_text: This product used to be good. It has changed. No longer small, very compacted tablets, they have changed to large, very porous tablets that turn to mush within 2-3 days. Tablets used to last about a month. Now, less than a week and they're already a gelled blob. Very disappointing.

reviews.title: Use if you enjoy washing your toilet frequently!!
reviews.review_text: I've bought these tablets before and it used to work great, but something changed. The tablets are larger and don't smell like bleach. After a few flushes, it leaves a foamy layer in the bowl water and soon the toilet turns brownish gray below the water line. I'm washing the toilet way more than I ever had to!! The tablet in tank becomes a difficult to remove glob!! This product is absolutely horrible now!!

reviews.title: Low Price
reviews.review_text: I don't have anything to compare it to as far as length of use. I like the low price compared to others, even if I have to add one a little more often (again, I don't know the length of use for others, and I am not tracking the length of use on this item either).

this product is awful. it forms a hard gel like bubble in the tank that is difficult to get rid of it just sits there and does nothing until I scrob at it with toilet brush and then it is nearly impossible to get off the toilet brush. it does not compare with brand name at all.

reviews.title: These toilet tablets don't work
reviews.review_text: I purchased this toilet cleaner because I have purchased the bleach tablets for years. When I didn't see my toilet bowl becoming any cleaner, and I didn't smell any bleach, I looked in the tank. There was a blob where I had placed the tablet. I took the blob out of my toilet tank and threw it in the garbage. They're useless

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY! I would give it zero stars if I could. I usually buy Clorox brand bleach tablets but bought these due to them being cheaper in price. They ruined our toilets! They turned into a gooey, gel blob that coated our toilet bowls with gel that dirt stuck to! Do yourself a favor and buy the name brand. I had to clean my toilets more often with these and finally figured out why!

reviews.title: Stick with the name brand
reviews.review_text: Great value has always been a great value for me. This bleach toilet tab is the exception. It turns into a giant blob in the back of the toilet. I had my reservations when I opened the package as it had a different look and feel of the Clorox brand. But I gave it a try anyway. In addition to the giant blob it does not keep the toilet bowl fresh and within a few days of using it saw a difference in how clean my toilet bowl was not.

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.review_text: These used to be as good as the Clorox tabs. Now you drop them in and they turn to gel that does not dissolve. They no longer clean and no bleach smell like they use to have. Absolutely junk. My guess is GV is using a different supplier as the box does not say new and improved. They Just packed this crap in a box and since it has the GV label no one cares.

reviews.title: Waste Of Money
reviews.review_text: Don't listen to the paid reviews that say "[This review was collected as part of a promotion.]" I don't know what they've done, but these aren't the same anymore. Used to use them all the time, but now they just turn into a blob in your tank that sits there and does nothing. Cleaning action stopped after a few days at best. After a week I tried stirring up the blob only to find it stuck to the bottom of the tank. And the gel gets under the flapper and causes issues. I'm going to have to drain the tank and scrub the rest of it out. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Total Waste of Money!!
reviews.review_text: I would give these a negative star if I could, they're totally worthless, do not waste your money. Instead of slowly dissolving into the water like they should, they just absorb water and grow into a big mass of goo and never do anything to keep the toilet clean.

I didn't read the reviews because I've purchased this many times in the past. So now in reading the reviews, I see that it wasn't a fluke, the toilet bowl water is foamy and cloudy, and in the tank it's a big blob of gel. I will purchase a name brand from now on.

reviews.title: WILL NO LONGER BUY
reviews.review_text: They changed the product. I've used these tablets for years, because of the price and they did the job. Whatever they did, the tablets no longer clean as effectively, or last as long. The product foams, but that doesn't make it any better. I will be buying the higher priced product in the future.

reviews.title: Awesome Product!

reviews.review_text: There must've been a formula change, as these used to be great tablets that got the job done. Now it just turns into a giant glob sitting in the tank, not doing any cleaning. Very disappointing!

reviews.title: Another Good Product Changed
reviews.review_text: Have been using these tablets for years. The last ones I bought are totally different. Don't work as well, no bleach smell after flushing the toilet. Also, do not last as long. Very disappointing.

I like to keep my toilet bowls cleaned and bacteria free. These great value brand does the job. we have 3 toilets in our house and I'm a little bit OCD about keeping the bathrooms clean and the dishes washed.

reviews.title: Horrible product now that it has different ingredi
reviews.review_text: These tablets DO NOT work. Toilet bowl got moldy ring around top of water in bowl just as if I had not used anything. This new formulation is awful. Bring back the old formulation please

reviews.title: The worst bleach tablets
reviews.review_text: Please don't buy!! The worst product ever! It's a sticky big foam that doesn't smell!! They gotta take this product out!!! Report this product!!! Take off shelves please!!!!!!

reviews.title: They changed to a less powerful product.
reviews.review_text: This product has changed since I first started using it. Before my most recent purchase you could smell the bleach whenever you flushed the toilet but now nothing and the size of the disks has changed as well, they are bigger but I don't think they are as strong as they were before. I'll know more after the first disk has fully dissolved but I don't expect the same results as I have has with these before, only time will tell.

I discovered these about 5 years ago and I cannot live without them you never really have to clean your toilet but I do anyway keeps the tank smelling fresh and clean I love them they're a little expensive maybe not as expensive as the other brand but still they've gone up a couple of dollars. if they keep getting more expensive I guess I'll have to revert to my daily toilet washing

reviews.title: Works as designed
reviews.review_text: These work nicely. There is a blob at the bottom of the tank (there is no way that would ever stay in tablet shape) but it is getting smaller over time. There is a faint odor of bleach which is what I wanted - it means the tablet is doing the job it was designed to do.

reviews.title: Formula changed! These are HORRIBLE!
reviews.review_text: I have bought the great value brand toilet tabs for years on end, and they have been great functionally as well as being a better price point than the name brands. I purchased a new box several weeks ago and realized the box looks the same but the content packaging and size of the tablets has changed. They are most definitely NOT the same product I've always received. Skip to today when I realized the toilets in the house were already starting to have a film and form rings. This only ever used to happen when the tablet dissolved completely. Now it's happening before it's dissolved, AND it is creating cloudy water in the tank and bubbles as it flushes. I noticed that a couple weeks ago and was confused but at the time didn't connect the two. The formula HAS TO GO BACK TO THE OLD FORMULA. THESE ARE ABSOLUTE TRASH! I will be looking elsewhere for these now. Absolutely the worst product change I have ever witnessed with my own eyes! They do not work anymore!

reviews.title: Do not purchase this product!
reviews.review_text: I have been buying this product for a long time. And it always worked great. They recently changed the formula and now it is HORRIBLE! It turns into a gummy mess at the bottom of the toilet tank and doesn't dissolve. There is no smell of bleach. It's not a good value because it does nothing. Please don't waste your money.

reviews.title: TRASH
reviews.review_text: I bought these thinking the last ones I had were some other knockoff as they were not very bleachy and turned to mush after about a week. When I opened the film, I realized they were the same ones but used it anyway thinking I may had just gotten a bad batch. These are identical. Nothing on box about a new formula(probably because it's a formula I wouldn't advertise as new or improved). I will NOT buy again and will look to get refund

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.review_text: These bleach tablets don't dissolve well with water whereas the premium brand's tablets dissolve perfectly well. These Great Value tablets leave a mysteriously milky puddle in the water, at the bottom of the water tank. That puddle has to be agitated with a brush for it to clear when the tank is flushed. The toilet bowl is dirty when the milky puddle is still in the water tank. What a waste of money. Great Value's bleach tablets used to be good. Then they went away for a while, at least from our store, and when they returned the product seems to have changed.

reviews.title: unbelievably awful
reviews.review_text: Literally awful. Turned into a ball of mush instantly. After 1 month it is still a blob in my tank. It did not clean the bowl at all. Stll have a ring around my bowl. I still have to scrub once a week. No bleach in this tab whatsoever. Does absolutely nothing. Do not buy! Give everyone their money back.

reviews.title: Used to work
reviews.review_text: Ive bought these for a couple years but now they must be a different formula. The tablet turned into a rubbery blob that wont disolve unless I take my brush and scrape at it every few days. Its stuck to the bottom so I cant get it out. Toilet is mildew ringed after a few days, like theres no tablet at all. Stick with Clorox brand.

reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
reviews.review_text: After giving my toilet a good manual scrub, I followed the instructions on the box. Three weeks later, it does not seem to work at all. My toilet still generates pink stains from where the water from the tank is expelled on the sides of the bowl. The toilet tank looks as dirty as when I first dropped the tablet in. I am returning the product for a refund.

reviews.title: Fell off...
reviews.review_text: I don't know what happened to the things they used to be great. They were a hard as bricks. If you clanked two of them together, they'd sound like two stone pavers. They literally would not break. Very sturdy tablets. AND they had a super strong bleach smell. Now...they are soft like they've been exposed to humidity or moisture. They crumble from the pack and dissolve almost instantly. No bleach smell whatsoever. At first, I thought I just got a bad batch because I ordered online and received them via shipping. That was about a month ago. So, I decided to go in-store to pick up a box. It's the same crumby crud! I guess they changed manufacturers or something. Walmart, if you did, please go back to your original maker of these because they are absolutely trash now.
they are huge, so I don't need to buy as many anymore!
It seems to be helping with the problem of the ring in the toilet. It was driving me crazy.

reviews.title: Does the job!
reviews.review_text: Have used these for years. They do the job. No scent or color. Just drop into the tank.

reviews.title: Works goid
reviews.review_text: These work not quite as good as Clorox brand but they are much cheaper.
Dissolves in less than 10 days. I'll stick with the name brand.
Never changes and is a viable option for those on a smaller budget.
Bought what I found to be a great item at a very good price.
these still work ok but I prefer the old formula which seemed to have more bleach

reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
reviews.review_text: Wow….these chairs exceed my expectations! They're even better than pictured. The seat is larger than my old chairs I'm replacing. Which makes it perfect to add cushions and they fit nicely for larger bodies. The wood is a bit soft and I'm praying that doesn't affect them holding up for the long term. I enjoy the fact that they came with the adjustable feet that protect against scratches on my wooden floors pre-installed. Easy to put together with bolts already installed which made lining up screws and them catching a breeze. Great product overall. I may need to order another set to finish off seating for 6.

reviews.title: Beautiful and extremely nice quality for the price
reviews.review_text: These chairs are sturdy and very well constructed... beautiful mid century modern color and style 👌

reviews.title: Matched my Dining Table Perfectly!
reviews.review_text: They were daily easy to assemble once you got the hang of it. The cushion is a bit firm for my liking but other than that, the chair feels very sturdy and nice.

reviews.title: Nice for the price
reviews.review_text: These chairs I would say are decently sturdy. One of the 4 chairs were uneven. Thankfully they have foot adjusters. The reason 4 stars instead of 5 is one piece of wood cracked even though there are pre drilled holes. That should have not been the case. The set is nice and looks more expensive than 35$ a chair. I like that it's made from actual wood. Instructions are clear and easy to follow took about 50min to assemble all 4 solo. They meet my expectations and I would purchase them again

reviews.title: Good but hard seats
reviews.review_text: I'd really give this like 4.5 stars. The chairs were very easy to put together, between my husband and I all four took maybe 20 minutes. The cushions are VERY firm which is why I deducted a star.

reviews.title: Good buy
reviews.review_text: Nice solid chairs, one of the screw holes did not line up with assembly. Cushions are firm. Would recommend for a low cost set of chairs
Some of the chairs came scratched and slightly cracked. Most of the pre drilled holes didn't align at all. I had to make my own holes. Sturdy and usable definitely not good quality.

reviews.title: Broke the first time I sat in it
reviews.review_text: Don't buy!! I weigh 160, should not be anywhere near weight limit. The FIRST time I sat in one of the chairs it split down a whole side and fell apart. Surprisingly I did t get hurt. Thankfully it wasn't my grandma or a child that sat in it and couldn't have caught themselves.

reviews.title: Terrible Quality and Terrible Manufacturer Support
reviews.review_text: I strongly advise against buying these Mainstays chairs. The quality is extremely poor and they are a safety hazard. After only one month of normal use, a part for one of the chairs completely broke while an adult was sitting on it. The person was well below the product's stated weight limit, so this is a clear manufacturing defect. To make matters worse, the manufacturer's customer service was just as bad as the product's quality. When I contacted them for a warranty replacement part (just the part not the whole chair), they refused to send it unless I paid a $25 shipping fee. A company should not charge customers to fix their brand new, defective products. Between the dangerous lack of quality and the unhelpful manufacturer support, I cannot recommend these chairs at all. Avoid this product.

reviews.title: don't buy

reviews.title: Looks higher end

reviews.title: Uneven legs

Most of the junction are not clean cut. You have to alter/clean/shave off extra parts in order to make it fit. One of the joint came snapped to which you will not be able to screw it or use glue to make it work. Let's see how long the other chair will survive daily use.

the chairs matches well with my dining table and easily assembled.

reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
reviews.review_text: Wow….these chairs exceed my expectations! They're even better than pictured. The seat is larger than my old chairs I'm replacing. Which makes it perfect to add cushions and they fit nicely for larger bodies. The wood is a bit soft and I'm praying that doesn't affect them holding up for the long term. I enjoy the fact that they came with the adjustable feet that protect against scratches on my wooden floors pre-installed. Easy to put together with bolts already installed which made lining up screws and them catching a breeze. Great product overall. I may need to order another set to finish off seating for 6.

reviews.title: Beautiful and extremely nice quality for the price
reviews.review_text: These chairs are sturdy and very well constructed... beautiful mid century modern color and style 👌

reviews.title: Matched my Dining Table Perfectly!
reviews.review_text: They were daily easy to assemble once you got the hang of it. The cushion is a bit firm for my liking but other than that, the chair feels very sturdy and nice.

reviews.title: Nice for the price
reviews.review_text: These chairs I would say are decently sturdy. One of the 4 chairs were uneven. Thankfully they have foot adjusters. The reason 4 stars instead of 5 is one piece of wood cracked even though there are pre drilled holes. That should have not been the case. The set is nice and looks more expensive than 35$ a chair. I like that it's made from actual wood. Instructions are clear and easy to follow took about 50min to assemble all 4 solo. They meet my expectations and I would purchase them again

reviews.title: Good but hard seats
reviews.review_text: I'd really give this like 4.5 stars. The chairs were very easy to put together, between my husband and I all four took maybe 20 minutes. The cushions are VERY firm which is why I deducted a star.

reviews.title: Good buy
reviews.review_text: Nice solid chairs, one of the screw holes did not line up with assembly. Cushions are firm. Would recommend for a low cost set of chairs
Some of the chairs came scratched and slightly cracked. Most of the pre drilled holes didn't align at all. I had to make my own holes. Sturdy and usable definitely not good quality.

reviews.title: Broke the first time I sat in it
reviews.review_text: Don't buy!! I weigh 160, should not be anywhere near weight limit. The FIRST time I sat in one of the chairs it split down a whole side and fell apart. Surprisingly I did t get hurt. Thankfully it wasn't my grandma or a child that sat in it and couldn't have caught themselves.

reviews.title: Terrible Quality and Terrible Manufacturer Support
reviews.review_text: I strongly advise against buying these Mainstays chairs. The quality is extremely poor and they are a safety hazard. After only one month of normal use, a part for one of the chairs completely broke while an adult was sitting on it. The person was well below the product's stated weight limit, so this is a clear manufacturing defect. To make matters worse, the manufacturer's customer service was just as bad as the product's quality. When I contacted them for a warranty replacement part (just the part not the whole chair), they refused to send it unless I paid a $25 shipping fee. A company should not charge customers to fix their brand new, defective products. Between the dangerous lack of quality and the unhelpful manufacturer support, I cannot recommend these chairs at all. Avoid this product.

reviews.title: don't buy
reviews.review_text: came damaged .. the packaging is difficult and unless you unwrap every single piece first to make sure they're all in good shape you'll end up putting together 3 before you notice. also they don't have pre drilled holes that line up so prepare for a really difficult build !!!

Most of the junction are not clean cut. You have to alter/clean/shave off extra parts in order to make it fit. One of the joint came snapped to which you will not be able to screw it or use glue to make it work. Let's see how long the other chair will survive daily use.

The chairs are sturdy and beautiful, but a pain to put together in my opinion. Waiting to hear back from the company for replacement parts.

reviews.title: Misleading Label of ingredients--Contains ALLERGEN
reviews.review_text: The online website failed to update the ingredients list with new allergens not previously contained in this 64oz size OJ. This produce NOW contains traces of MILK, EGGS and SOY and I had a bad reaction! A few months ago, it was only the gallon sized OJ that had those allergens, but now it is ALSO the 64oz size!! I am so disappointed. I have a severe allergy to inhaled particles of soy and eggs--and a few minutes after I poured a glass of orange juice for my son, my throat began to get tight! I had to take an antihistamine quickly and open the window, and my husband had to take my son outside so he could drink the juice! So ridiculous. The price is a few pennies cheaper than other brands, and we are a lower-income family--so we picked this product and ordered it online. Sadly the ingredients label wasn't updated in the photos. I tookj a photo showing the new label contains these three serious allergens. I tried uploading it as a JPG 194 KB (well under the 5 MB max) and it failed, and then tried uploading as a PNG image (1.14 MB -- still well under the 5 MB max) and that failed as well. The website says there is a problem even though my pic is well under maximum of 5MB. I have tried uploading and re-creating this post in both my Chrome browser and in Microsof Edge Browser, but no option works for a successful upload, so that isn't fair either. But believe me there are REAL traces of these allergens in the product now, if anyone in your family is allergic to these allergens, then DON'T buy this product.

reviews.title: Pulp good. Fizz not good.
reviews.review_text: I selected GV Original OJ after deciding to try ready-made juice, i.e. not from concentrate. The first time I purchased this product (about four weeks ago), my husband shook and then opened the container. It bubbled up out of the bottle and made a mess, as if it was carbonated. When he sampled it, it was clearly distasteful, as if it had fermented and soured. This was despite opening it on the "Best By" date. We threw it out. Last week, I decided to give this product another try. The "Best By"date for the container I purchased is Sept. 16. (There is no year printed on the bottle, but I assumed it was for 2023.) When I opened the bottle, it made a slight fizzing sound, but the juice seemed fine. But over the next four days it became progressively more sour and seemingly carbonated. Again, we had to toss most of the OJ. I had thought that our first experience was a one-off. But when it happened a second time, I thought you should know. We will not be purchasing this product again. I'm not asking for a refund. I'm just giving you feedback.

reviews.title: Bad orange juice.
reviews.review_text: This orange juice (3) were too close to the expiring date. When I opened it, it tasted funny--like a biting taste--maybe fermented. The containers are all bulged! What is Walmart's problem lately? The other juice I had been buying was out of stock. That seems to be the normal at Walmart lately! At least they did refund my money. I guess I will need to buy my orange juice from Aldi from now on.

reviews.title: Not a good imitation of orange juice
reviews.review_text: The contents of this product trying to pass as orange juice should be labeled as unknown. The container builds up pressure as in outgassing, the smell is close to a vitamin chemical smell, nothing like orange, and the taste is like grapefruit juice that has been in an untreated metal container less the grapefruit. An after taste is also present of a metallic nature. My wife experienced the same from 2 containers.

I read that this is a sign that something went wrong at the Plant so I kept buying more hoping the next batch would be better but so far no luck.

reviews.title: Best store - bought guacamole ever
reviews.review_text: I don't know where all you people with the bad reviews are getting your "freshness guaranteed" guacamole from but ours was perfect, the picture doesn't lie. Today was our very first time trying it and I will say it is the best store - bought guacamole ever and no I'm not lying or exaggerating. Aside from the homemade one you make at home, this is the next best thing, it comes really close to homemade. It's just the right amount of avocados, creaminess, thickness and spices. Most other store - bought guacamole are either too acidic, too garlicky or too salty. But this one is just right. It's the closet thing next to homemade. I highly recommend it. Try it for yourself and you will see. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_text: When I purchased this the first time I was extremely impressed. It remains the best premade I have bought in a store. It's fresh and seasoned perfectly. Heaven! Growing up in south Texas I've had more guacamole more than I can count and this is in the top 2 for me. I've taken it out for cookouts and it is scraped clean. We've used it on every type of grilled foods possible and it's never disappointed. I get mild because everyone has their own tastes as far as heat. Easy to add. Price is fine. Enjoy this fabulous guacamole!

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These chocolates are the highlight of my valentines, they always taste great and are usually gone the second I bring them into the house, I recommend them for anyone who has a sweet tooth around valentines or wants to brighten up someone's day!

reviews.title: Tastes good

reviews.title: A Valentines Day stable since I was little
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] At this point, I don't know who hasn't tried these. I picked these up every single Valentine's Day and received them ever since I was just a little girl. There's really nothing bad I can say besides a lot of sugar, but if you're eating chocolate, shouldn't be a problem for you. I will continue buying these forever. If you haven't bought it yet, I don't know what you're waiting for. Highly recommend! My fav is nut caramel.

reviews.title: Tastes Like Chocolate!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Received an assortment of chocolate courtesy of Influenster to sample. 7 pieces, 6 flavors. Nothing to write home about - tastes like chocolate! There was caramel, peanut cluster, strawberry creme, nut caramel, vanilla creme and chocolate butter creme. Mix of milk and dark chocolate. Presentation-wise = nice. Nothing to hate on. Comparable to fancy chocolate. Taste-wise = average. Sometimes chocolate just doesn't taste high-quality and plastic-y, which this one reminded me of. It wasn't horrible - just tasted like cheap grocery store chocolate. But as most chocolate eaters would probably agree in - chocolate is chocolate - can't really mess it up and even bad chocolate tastes like chocolate. These would be a good gift for kiddos on valentines. Or to go along with another gift. They all tasted very similar for the most part. Very sweet and sugary. Size for price could be a lot better. But overall - just your average box or chocolates.

reviews.title: Love it!

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I liked that this box had an assortment of flavors, though I was curious as to why they included two strawberry flavored ones in the box instead of finding one other chocolate flavor to include, even if it was milk chocolate — I liked the variety for such a small box. My main concern was that the list of chocolates was only printed on a sticker attached to the wrapper and not anywhere on the box, I had to keep the wrapper with the box until I finished it. I don't mind the flavor being a surprise at first, but I do like knowing what flavor it is after biting into it — I shouldn't have to keep the wrapper just for that.

reviews.title: Satisfied with functional performance.

So basically if you can charge device by plugging into your computer's USB port, then it will likely work with this one too.

reviews.title: Good for a needed port!
reviews.review_text: This no name brand 4 port usb hub seems to work fine with my ergonomic mouse and to my Epson eco tank printer. Decided to try lowest priced model, as I needed the extra port not a available from my tablet. Would prefer lit ports over single 1" power light, but can't complain. Don't know how well the unit will hold up yet.

reviews.title: Descent 4-port usb hub
reviews.review_text: Cheaply made but does as intended. I kind of wish my usb wires could have fit down more flush with the unit but, its not too big of a deal as long as it still can send and receive data through an ssd or phone. The other thing i noticed is that the wire coming out does twist a hair when moving it but its not coming loose any time soon. I currently have mine set up flat with some velcro to keep it firmly in place. Overall, its a descent 4 port hub. i however may not use my ssd on it when i get said ssd. Charging my phone and maybe moving my logitech mouse dongle to it is probably how i will end up using this since i am currently using a laptop with limited usb ports available. It probably would be okay though for ssd too but i'm just not gonna. I feel its well worth the price listed though and because it works.

reviews.title: POOR DESIGN - Needs Longer Cord
reviews.review_text: Bought this to add USB ports to my PC (Dell XPS). Works well, BUT only has a very short cord - the USB ports on my pc are above the halfway point on the tower and this cord length (which was NOT mentioned anywhere in the description) only allows the very tip of the device to rest on desk. It just kind of half dangles there, putting strain on the pc USB port. POOR DESIGN.

reviews.title: Way Too Slow!
reviews.review_text: Maybe it is just this adapter, but when I plugged my ssd into the adapter it slowed it down so much that it was taking minutes to download programs that take seconds to download when plugged into the same port the adapter was plugged into on my computer. So I tried it with thumb drives and the results were the same, super slow when plugged into the adapter and normal when plugged directly into the computer.

reviews.title: Not true USB 3.0
reviews.review_text: I bought this hub through Walmart.com from Poweradd, but I have seen it with several different brand names on it from different vendors (<$5 on eBay). Be advised that the product I received WAS NOT USB 3.0. Although the plugs were blue, they only had 4 conductors. A true USB 3.0 has the usual 4 of USB 2.0, but also has another 5 small ones tucked in between the larger 4 conductors. The plugs on this thing didn't have the addition 5 conductors and had transfer rates barely better than USB 2.0.

reviews.title: Awesome little USB hub
reviews.review_text: Everything worked great on it. Really appreciated a few things about this device. 1. The cable on it has a decent bit of length. Lots of cheap hubs give you just a few inches of cable to work with. 2. Having three ports on the top. A lot easier for plugging in jump drives and the like since you just push them down, other hubs you have to pick the hub up because the ports are all on the side. 3. The ports are arranged "vertically" rather than "horizontally". You'll know what I'm talking about if you've ever had a usb device that was really wide and you had to unplug the adjacent ports for it to fit in. Shouldn't have that problem here - awesome!

reviews.title: Insten 4 Port USB Hub

I used this to attach a printer, mouse and keyboard all to a single USB port on my PC. The extra long cable is great so you can place it where you want it. Other USB hubs tend to have shorter cables and are not that easy to work with. For $ 2.79 you just cant beat the deal !! It's sweet and works great !!

reviews.title: Rough Beginning…But Now It's All Good!
reviews.review_text: I loved the price on these shoes! Unfortunately, there were two issues with them. First, they had a very strong chemical smell that didn't go away until they sat on my outside porch for nearly three weeks in the Florida heat and humidity. Second, one of the shoes is actually smaller than the other, so the first week I wore them, I had a nasty, raw blister on my Achilles tendon (ouch!!) that I had to cover up daily with gauze and tape until it healed. They are obviously not the same size! I attached a photo as evidence. The good news is that when the blister healed, that skin is thicker than it was and now it no longer hurts and I can wear the shoe without a band aid or gauze and tape LOL. If I wasn't part of the working class poor, I would have returned them and gotten a different shoe. But I got through the pain and smell of them and they're pretty comfortable! I did end up getting a thicker sole insert for them as I work in a kitchen and stand and walk all day.

I can't say whether they've returned to their old formula as I wasn't using it when it was actively in use, but it did seem more like a traditional cream in texture than before.

reviews.title: Disappointed with the Change in Formula
reviews.review_text: I've been using this diaper rash cream for my second child, who's now 4 months old. We immediately noticed that the packaging and texture were different from when we used it for our first child just 3.5 years ago. For the past 2.5 months, we've been dealing with a mild diaper rash, visiting the doctor twice to have the rash cultured and giving extra air time to help with healing. Despite all this, we've only seen minimal improvement. Curious about the difference, I found an old tube of the Honest Diaper Rash Cream and compared the ingredients. After reading through older reviews, it became clear that the formula has changed. Sadly, the new formula hasn't been effective in protecting my baby's skin. We've decided to discontinue use, and after just two days, we've already seen noticeable improvement. If you're experiencing similar issues, I recommend trying other products first before sticking with this one.

reviews.title: Ingredient Changes Ruin Product
reviews.review_text: I am a 62 year old with a digestive health issue that sometimes requires me to use a diaper rash cream. I have tried many of the popular brands. They burned when applied. Honest was the first brand that did the job and did not burn. I have happily used it for several years. While away on vacation, I found myself in need of a cream.. I couldn't find Honest. I purchased something with similar ingredients. Brand new out of the box, the ingredients had separated into a gooey mess. I got my money back, but was miserable for the rest of the trip. . I returned home planning to purchase a spare tube of Honest Diaper Rash Cream to keep for travel only to find the ingredients had changed. Instead of a list of almost all natural ingredients, I found ingredients like Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacladipate-2 which is a synthetic emollient along with at least 8 or 9 other non-organic ingredients. It doesn't feel the same as my other tube of Honest Cream. It doesn't smell the same. I am very disappointed. I had been giving a tube of Honest Diaper Rash Cream to mothers at baby showers. I will be calling them to warn them about the changes. I do not know what I will do when my last tube of the original formula of Honest Diaper Rash Cream runs out.

reviews.review_text: I used to use this cream in a variety of ways for my daughter. She has very sensitive skin and breaks out in ezcema rashes from time to time. The old formula was amazing. After a 3 week breakout that covered half her body, and trying numerous eczema creams, the old formula of this diaper rash cream was the ONLY thing that cleared it up. I am SO sad that they changed the formula. It is no longer effective. This is the only thing that healed my daughters skin and now I'm at a loss. I assume this change was done in an attempt to go vegan, but they truly missed the mark. Some things are better left alone and this is one of them. It's sad when a company sacrifices quality to fit into a "box". I'm all for using ethical products when it makes sense, but this product worked so well in its original formula. Please please please bring back the old formula!!! I beg of you.

reviews.title: A lifesaver!

reviews.title: The Honest Company Diaper Rash Cream is an effective and natural solution for treating and preventing diaper rash in babies.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this Honeat Company Diaper Rash Cream for free as part of an incentivized program in exchange for my honest review. The Honest Company Diaper Rash Cream uses organic shea, jojoba, tamanu, and coconut oils to moisturize and nurture the skin. The formula also contains non-nano zinc oxide, which helps reduce redness, inflammation, and protect chafed skin. It works well to soothe irritation and clear up diaper rash quickly. The hypoallergenic and plant-based formula is gentle on sensitive skin. Some users note that it helps create a protective barrier and makes diaper changes easier. Overall, the Honest Company Diaper Rash Cream seems to be a high-quality, natural option for managing and preventing diaper rash in babies. The combination of moisturizing oils and zinc oxide appears to be effective at providing relief and promoting healing.
